article.title: McDonnel Douglas to Supply Finland With F-18 Upgrade Kits
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: McDonnell Douglas Corporation, a subsidiary of The Boeing Company, has been awarded a $13.7 million delivery order for the procurement of two F/A-18C/D Mid-Life Upgrade 2 validation-verification kits for the Finnish Air Force under the Foreign Military Sales program.
